title: mInAkSi mEmudam dEhi
sahitya:
mInAkSi mE mudam dEhi mEcakAngi rAjamAtangi


anupallavi

 mAnamAtrumE mAyE marakata chAyE shivajAyE 
mInalOcani pAshamOcani mAnini kadamba vanavAsini


caraNam   madurApuri nilayE maNivalayE malayadhvaja pANDya rAja tanayE 
vidhuviDambana vadanE vijayE vINAgAna dasha gamakakriyE 
madhu mada mOdita hrdayE sadayE mahAdEva sundarEshapriyE
